title: I HATE the SIZE of Pixel 5 will the PIXEL 6 be XL? If not I have to switch, i tried but its aweful.
content:
Will Pixel 6 come in XL?
The size of pixel 5 was EXCRUTIATING, I suffer every day with it, i will abandone Google phones if pressed to this small size, I love the sistem but size is aweful, I hope someone is readin this & understand. Google team
